#load data
```{r}
person2020 = read.csv("./person2020.csv")
dat=data.frame(person2020)
head(dat)

person2019 = read.csv("./person2019.csv")
dat19=data.frame(person2019)
head(dat)
```

# extract entities 
```{r}
state_name=dat$STATENAME
month_name=dat$MONTHNAME
day_name=dat$DAYNAME


# total car wreck deaths in 2019&2020
table_death_count2020=table(dat$DOA)

total2020=table_death_count2020[2]+table_death_count2020[3]
total2020

table_death_count2019=table(dat19$DOA)
total2019=table_death_count2019[2]+table_death_count2019[3]
total2019

df2019=data.frame(total2019)
df2020=data.frame(total2020)

tabledata = c("Year", "Count")

ggplot(df2019, aes(y=df2019$total2019))+ geom_histogram(binwidth = 5)+ggtitle("DEATH COUNT PER YEAR 2019")
ggplot(df2020, aes(y=df2020$total2020))+ geom_histogram(binwidth = 5)+ggtitle("DEATH COUNT PER YEAR 2020")
```
V
```{r}

n=table(dat$MONTHNAME)
n
ggplot(data = dat, aes(x=MONTHNAME))+geom_bar(width=.7)+ggtitle("DEATH COUNT PER MONTH")
```
# apply filters for unknown data 
```{r}
age_f<-data.frame(AGE=dat$AGE[dat$AGE<115])
ggplot(data=age_f, aes(x=AGE))+geom_bar(width=.5)+ggtitle("AGE")
```
